product_name: BioSteel Professional Sports Team Bottle, BPA Free Sports Water Bottle, 27 Ounce/800 Milliliter Capacity
description: Sports Hydration: Our Team Bottle is perfect for team sports, gruelling workouts, and daily thirst quenching. It’s used by professional athletes everywhere to deliver hydration when they need it most.  Convenience At Hand: Our sports bottle has a pressure-released dispenser tip for hands-free hydration. Giving it a simple squeeze will help dispense the liquid quicker.  Multi-Use: This squeeze bottle is ideal to use as a water bottle or to add your favourite ready-to-drink sports drink or hydration mix. Not only is it great for adult sports use, but because it is lightweight, it’s also ideal for kids.  Important Info: This sports bottle is made from BPA Free plastic and is top-rack dishwasher safe. It is recommended to clean both the bottle and the cap after each use to prevent dirt buildup.  Our Mission: We aim to create the most trusted sports hydration products on the planet. Whether you’re a pro athlete, the next generation of athletes, a weekend warrior, or just living your everyday life, we are the better hydration option.

latest_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
latest_reviews.comment: Excellent item good price I recommend
